user.description:
Setup Epson Projector. **Make sure the projector is turned ON for setup if you are polling additional properties or have not enabled network in standby mode.**

you must set projector to keep network on when off. For Home Cinema projector set **"Standby Mode"** to **"Standby Mode: Communication On"**. Only power state is pushed. All other properties are polled serially.

init.description:
Setup Epson Projector. **Make sure the projector is turned ON for setup if you are changing polled properties.**

If you want to get push notifications for power state, you must set projector to keep network on when off. For Home Cinema projector set **"Standby Mode"** to **"Standby Mode: Communication On"**. Only power state is pushed. All other properties are polled serially.

data.scan_interval: Scan interval in seconds for power state
